description: Millions of Syrian refugees have fled into Jordan and the extra strain may be proving to be too much for a host country that is suffering from its own economic problems. The UK’s Royal Mail service may go private. And what happened to all the salespeople who sold subprime mortgages leading up to the Lehman collapse?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 12, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, Jeff Tyler, David Weinberg, Sam Beard, Stacey Vanek Smith, Sabri Ben-Achour, Mark Garrison, Diane Swonk and David Brancaccio
teaser: Millions of Syrian refugees have fled into Jordan and the extra strain may be proving to be too much for a host country that is suffering from its own economic problems. The UK’s Royal Mail service may go private. And what happened to all the salespeople who sold subprime mortgages leading up to the Lehman collapse?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 12, 2013
